channel.title: Calculating straight lines based on current position and current rotation
channel.description:
I'm not quite sure of the algorithm to use to calculate a straight line from a given position and given rotation/face. Perhaps there's an easier way and maybe I'm over thinking how to do it.
Example:
[img]http://i61.tinypic.com/311rw9v.png[/img]
The blue line is the line the object needs to take given the objects current rotation and the object only travels straight. The X and Y will have to change accordingly to keep in this straight line.
Will I have to use some pathfinding for this or is there an easier way?
